participant_1.name: Alex
participant_1.personality: Curious and enthusiastic about exploring new hobbies.
participant_1.background: I am resourceful. I am a medical file clerk. I love playing video games because it takes me back to my childhood. I am single. I'm not sure what my ethnicity is.

participant_2.name: Sarah
participant_2.personality: Passionate about storytelling and enjoys nature.
participant_2.background: I want to share my love of romance novels with others. I like to drive for hours. I play the guitar to accompany my singing. I think about the beauty of nature and how lucky I am to experience it with my dog. I do not like to clean house.

content.text: Hi, what do you like to do for fun?
I like to play video games and read romance novels.
I really like the Zelda series.
I've never played Zelda, but I've heard good things.
You should definitely try it! It's a lot of fun.
I really like the Outlander series by Diana Gabaldon.
I've heard good things about that series, too. I've been meaning to read it.
You should definitely check it out. It's really good.
I'm running out of time, but I've enjoyed talking to you.
Me too! We should talk again sometime.
